spinseeker_max_clm.label: Spin Max
spinseeker_max_clm.description: Highest score obtained by any single tweet for similarity of content to those tweeted by known ISIL Twitter accounts. Higher generally indicates more ISIL-like content.

spinseeker_mean_clm.label: Spin Mean
spinseeker_mean_clm.description: Mean (average) score over all tweets for similarity of content to those tweeted by known ISIL Twitter accounts. Higher generally indicates more ISIL-like content.

spinseeker_median_clm.label: Spin Median
spinseeker_median_clm.description: Median (middle) score over all tweets for similarity of content to those tweeted by known ISIL Twitter accounts. Higher generally indicates moreISIL-like content.

spinseeker_num_positive_clm.label: Spin Number Positive
spinseeker_num_positive_clm.description: Number of tweets classified by our algorithms as ISIL-like.

spinseeker_prop_positive_clm.label: Spin Proportion Positive
spinseeker_prop_positive_clm.description: Proportion of tweets classified by our algorithms as ISIL-like.
